name: Psychic Game
description: Guess which letter the computer is thinking in this very simple browser game powered by javascript code.

name: Word Guess
description: A twist from the 'Psychic Game' broswer app where you guess which word the computer is thinking of instead of a letter.

name: Crystal Collector
description: A fun and interactive web browsers game where you match a random target value by clicking on four crystals with unknown values.

name: Trivia Game
description: A quick and fun trivia game that accurately measures a person's intelligence with only five questions. 9 out of 10 dentists approve.

name: RPS Advance
description: RPS advance is a simple javascript app which allows a user to play Rock, Paper, Scissors against other players.

name: Liri
description: RPS advance is a simple javascript app which allows a user to play Rock, Paper, Scissors against other players.

name: Word Guess Constructor
description: This CLI app allows the user to play a hangman style word guessing game of popular TV show titles.

name: Bamazon
description: Bamazon is an Amazon-like storefront CLI app that connects with MySQL. The app will interact with a MySQL database either as a customer, manager, or supervisor.

name: Friend Finder
description: Friend Finder is a compatibility-based user matching application -- basically a dating app. This full-stack site will take in results from your users' surveys, then compare their answers with those from other users. The app will then display the name and picture of the user with the best overall match.

name: Burgers
description: Burgers is a full-stack browser application which logs your burger orders and the burgers that you've eaten.

name: Clicky Game
description: The Clicky Game is a react application game with characters from the popular tv show, 'The Office.'
